casebody.data:
Oscar MEJIA-ROJO, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Florida, Appellee. Case No. 2D17-1622 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed November 1, 2017. Osca Mejia-Rojo, Appellant, Pro se. Attorney General, Tallahassee. PER CURIAM.
